A4.text: The 2024 World Series was a best‑of‑seven playoff between the American League champion New York Yankees and the National League champion Los Angeles Dodgers.

A5.text: The series began on October 25 and ended on October 30 with the Dodgers defeating the Yankees in five games.

A6.text: In 2024, the New York Yankees returned for the first time since their 2009 championship, meeting the Los Angeles Dodgers in a matchup that had not happened since 1981.

A7.text: The 2024 World Series was the only World Series to not feature the Astros or Dodgers from 2017-2025.
